mapper.sql: select powerInfoId, powerNum01, powerNum02, powerNum03, powerNum04, powerNum05, powerNum06, remark, com_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, company,bill_date from sys_powernum
mapper.select: select sys_powernum.powerInfoId, sys_powernum.powerNum01, sys_powernum.powerNum02, sys_powernum.powerNum03, sys_powernum.powerNum04, sys_powernum.powerNum05, sys_powernum.powerNum06, sys_powernum.remark, sys_powernum.com_flag, sys_powernum.create_by, sys_powernum.create_time, sys_powernum.update_by, sys_powernum.update_time, sys_powernum.company,sys_powernum.bill_date,sys_dept.dept_name,sys_dept.leader from sys_powernum left join sys_dept on sys_powernum.company = sys_dept.dept_id where powerInfoId = #{powerInfoId}

select sys_powernum.powerInfoId, sys_powernum.powerNum01, sys_powernum.powerNum02, sys_powernum.powerNum03, sys_powernum.powerNum04, sys_powernum.powerNum05, sys_powernum.powerNum06, sys_powernum.remark, sys_powernum.com_flag, sys_powernum.create_by, sys_powernum.create_time, sys_powernum.update_by, sys_powernum.update_time, sys_powernum.company,sys_powernum.bill_date,sys_dept.dept_name,sys_dept.leader from sys_powernum left join sys_dept on sys_powernum.company = sys_dept.dept_id
and sys_powernum.company = #{company} and sys_powernum.com_flag = '2'

select sys_powernum.powerInfoId, sys_powernum.powerNum01, sys_powernum.powerNum02, sys_powernum.powerNum03, sys_powernum.powerNum04, sys_powernum.powerNum05, sys_powernum.powerNum06, sys_powernum.remark, sys_powernum.com_flag, sys_powernum.create_by, sys_powernum.create_time, sys_powernum.update_by, sys_powernum.update_time, sys_powernum.company,sys_powernum.bill_date,sys_dept.dept_name,sys_dept.leader from sys_powernum left join sys_dept on sys_powernum.company = sys_dept.dept_id
and sys_powernum.company = #{company}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_powernum
powerNum01, powerNum02, powerNum03, powerNum04, powerNum05, powerNum06, remark, com_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, company, bill_date,
#{powerNum01}, #{powerNum02}, #{powerNum03}, #{powerNum04}, #{powerNum05}, #{powerNum06}, #{remark}, #{comFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{company}, #{billDate},
mapper.delete:
delete from sys_powernum where powerInfoId in
#{powerInfoId}
